test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document the UI behavior)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that EOS transaction can be edited (gratuity and leave encashment amounts modified) and resubmitted without generic error messages
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS transaction editing and submission
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees and error message display
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap field in accrual report displays and is labeled correctly (should indicate Gross salary basis, not Basic salary only)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify month labels are clearly displayed on gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity file export has correctly aligned column headers matching the data content (e.g., 'hire date' column shows hire dates, not team lead names)
Verify presence of customization options, filtering mechanisms, and additional information fields in Gratuity Report download interface
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column) and only sums gratuity amount column
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly when report is downloaded
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form; check if country-specific labels are shown correctly
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Add or modify deductions if needed
System calculates and displays gratuity amount
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

task_flows.flow_name: Calculate Total Gratuity Liability for All Employees
steps: Export gratuity file with all employee liabilities
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS form field interactions and editability
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify that EOS form fields (gratuity description, gratuity amount, leave encashment amounts) are editable and can be modified and resubmitted without errors or field restrictions

Verify EOS calculation form accepts all required inputs (departure date, contract type, reason, service duration) and displays calculated gratuity amount in UI; note: actual calculation accuracy cannot be validated by Playwright
Verify EOS-related UI elements display correctly: End of Services tab visibility based on employee status, and gratuity accrual report column headers are present and labeled
All tickets relate to backend gratuity calculation formula correctness (leap years, contract types, service duration, UAE law compliance). Cannot be tested via Playwright UI automation.
Both tickets involve gratuity accrual report calculation accuracy and data consistency across payroll cycles. Requires backend/database verification, not UI testing.
Both involve backend logic for document generation and deduction tracking (payslip vs settlement letter, GOSI double-deduction). Cannot verify via UI automation.
Backend calculation verification for gratuity amounts across different contract types, service durations, and departure scenarios - requires backend testing, not UI automation
Verify gratuity file export interface displays correct month labels and column headers are properly aligned with data content

Verify gratuity export and custom report functionality: (1) Employee ID and Office columns present in gratuity export, (2) Report totals calculate correctly without including non-numeric columns, (3) Gratuity field available and displays in custom payroll report templates
Verify users can access payroll accrual reports (Gratuity Accrual, Air Ticket Allowance, Leave Salary Accrual) for multiple closed payroll cycles beyond the most recent period
Cannot test - all are backend calculation issues involving gratuity formula, service duration, and unpaid leave handling
Cannot test - both involve backend data consistency and file generation logic across system modules

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - ticket cancelled, no implementation to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test; involves backend calculation logic (leave encashment formula)

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation to test; involves system constraint validation (1-year hire date modification limit)

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Closed status - feature request already resolved; involves report data consolidation (backend calculation)
Closed status - support ticket already resolved; involves leave accrual calculation logic
Closed status - bug already resolved; involves backend calculation logic (service duration date arithmetic)

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service giving error: Something went wrong
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved; bug has been fixed and no longer testable. Requires backend calculation verification for decimal precision
Status is Resolved; feature request for backend reopen/reverse mechanism not implemented in UI
Requires verification of backend tenure calculation logic and comparison with MOHRE records; Playwright cannot validate calculation accuracy
Requires verification of gratuity calculation formula correctness; Playwright can only verify UI displays calculation but not validate mathematical accuracy
Status is Cancelled; no active issue to test
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for mid-month departures and unpaid leave adjustments; Playwright cannot validate formula correctness
Resolved - backend calculation discrepancy (AED 231,821 vs AED 252,485); testing would require verifying mathematical formula correctness which is backend logic, not UI
Resolved - backend calculation logic for document generation differentiation; cannot verify if system correctly separates payslip vs settlement letter generation without backend access

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved - backend calculation bug involving double deduction logic; requires database/calculation verification, not UI testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved - backend calculation of report balances across payroll cycles; cannot verify mathematical accuracy of opening/closing balances via UI alone
Closed - backend calculation issue where values change dynamically; requires database consistency verification, not UI testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved - backend calculation logic for leap year handling; cannot verify if formula includes/excludes Feb 29 without backend calculation verification
Resolved - backend calculation alignment with 2021 UAE Labor Law; requires verification of mathematical formula compliance, not UI testing
Resolved - backend calculation methodology discrepancy (AED 6,998.25 expected vs actual); testing would require verifying formula correctness
Resolved - backend calculation question about leap year handling; cannot verify mathematical logic via UI
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of calculations
Backend gratuity calculation logic verification; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of complex gratuity formulas
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity amounts
Backend calculation issue (incorrect AED 0 accrual amount) and historical date selection; Playwright cannot verify calculation accuracy or backend date handling
Backend salary configuration validation and error handling; Playwright cannot verify database salary configuration state
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation scenarios per UAE labor law; Playwright cannot verify mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - involves payroll transaction history validation and data modification constraints that cannot be tested through UI automation alone

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - involves mathematical formula verification (daily wage calculation method) which is a business logic computation, not UI validation
Backend calculation methodology - involves date calculation logic and comparison with external calculators, not UI element verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - involves pro-rated salary deduction computation logic that cannot be validated through UI testing
Backend calculation bug - involves month-counting logic and leave days formula verification, not UI element testing
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splits SIF files based on arrears logic; cannot verify file generation or splitting logic with UI testing
Data consistency issue across backend modules; requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization checks
Documentation/help article clarification request; not a testable UI bug

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation logic issue - gratuity amount computation based on departure reason; cannot verify mathematical correctness with UI testing
Backend calculation issue - unpaid leave days handling in gratuity formula; requires backend logic verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation issue - service duration calculation logic; cannot verify mathematical correctness of duration computation

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
